sub_title: Chancery Officer at Ministry of External Relations
summary: Proven capacity to follow up with multiple projects and stakeholders simultaneously. Excellent observational and analytical abilities. Verified leadership and team-building expertise. Very experienced in managing shifting priorities and limited resources. Up-to-date to the implementation of innovative strategies. Dynamic, responsible, versatile, keen to learn new skills, highly organized.

company.name: Consulate General of Brazil in Amsterdam

profile_positions.company: Consulate General of Brazil in Amsterdam
profile_positions.description:
• Overseeing the elaboration and confection of all consular documents, such as passports and vital certificates, particularly for Brazilian citizens, as well as notarial acts.
• Overall office manager, coordinating projects such as hiring third parties varied services, planning, executing and auditioning complex administration tasks involving Dutch providers and Brazilian public administration law, recruiting and training locally hired staff, as well as in charge of communications and archives.
• Organization and Management of Brazilian Cultural, Community and citizens' Council's events (guest lists, contact in local and international stakeholders, catering hiring, reception of guests, ceremonial procedures, amongst others).
profile_positions.title: Vice Consul

profile_positions.description: The Chancery Officer wields the formulation, implementation and execution of acts of technical analysis and administrative management necessary for the development of Brazilian foreign policy.
profile_positions.title: Chancery Officer
Consular Legislation Section, Consular Assistance Division

profile_positions.description:
• Providing support in circumstances affecting Brazilian citizens in distraught abroad, such as accidents, hospitalization, imprisonment, death, as well as guidance concerning the procedures to seize those situations (legal issues, contact with local authorities, translation/interpretation, etc). 
• Furthermore,  advising their relatives in Brazil with regards to the viable helping measures for the referred events.
profile_positions.title: Assistance to Brazilians Section, Consular Assistance Division

profile_positions.company: Consulate General of Brazil in Vancouver - Canada
profile_positions.description:
As a Vice-Consul, the responsibilities are:
• Assisting Brazilian citizens in Western Canada involved in situations such as accidents, hospitalization, imprisonment, death, etc.
• Contact with local authorities and other entities in order to support the Brazilian citizens and their families in the above mentioned crisis.
• Overseeing the elaboration and confection of all consular documents, such as passports and vital certificates, particularly for Brazilian citizens, as well as notarial acts.
• Participating in the recruiting and training of locally hired staff in the consular affairs areas.
• Daily management of consular sector e-mail box.
• Consulate's website elaboration and updates.
profile_positions.title: Vice-Consul, in charge of Brazilian Consular Affairs

profile_positions.company: Consulate General of Brazil in Vancouver - Canada
profile_positions.description:
• Promoting Brazil and Canada as educational destinations either to Brazilian citizens in Brazil as well as foreigners.
• Budget calculations for students' events.
• Organization of Brazilian students' fraternization meetings, with talks about the several aspects of a student's life in Canada.
• Elaboration of a "Life in Canada" publication for Brazilian students in Western Canada.
profile_positions.title: In charge of Educational Affairs

company.name: Embassy of Brazil in Praia, Cape Verde

profile_positions.company: Embassy of Brazil in Praia, Cape Verde
profile_positions.description:
As a Vice-Consul, the responsibilities are:
• Evaluation of necessary documents, execution and approval of Brazilian visas for Capeverdians and foreigners.
• Assisting Brazilian citizens in Cape Verde involved in situations such as accidents, hospitalization, imprisonment, death, etc.
• Contact with local authorities and other entities in order to support the Brazilian citizen and their families in the above mentioned crisis.
• Overseeing the elaboration and confection of all consular documents, such as passports and vital certificates, particularly for Brazilian citizens as well as notarial acts and visas for foreigners.
• Participating in the recruiting and training locally hired staff in the consular affairs areas.
• Daily management of consular sector e-mail box.
• Embassy's website elaboration and updates.
profile_positions.title: Vice-Consul, Head of Consular Sector

profile_positions.company: Embassy of Brazil in Praia, Cape Verde
profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for the Embassy's accounts payable.
• Operation of specific bookkeeping software
• Managing local employee's hiring and training as well as monthly remunerations
• Consular revenue books balancing
• Handling and inspecting general purchases and maintenance services
• Property and equipment inventory keeping inventory.
profile_positions.title: Head of Administration and Accounting Sectors
